name: Peppers And Anchovies
recipeIngredient: 4 roasted red or yellow bell peppers, peeled, stemmed and seeded
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Extra virgin olive oil to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cut peppers in large strips, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Top each with an anchovy fillet. Drizzle with olive oil and optional lemon juice or vinegar. Serve on rounds of bread with capers, if you like.
